import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { welcomeMessage: string = ''; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.http.get('http://localhost:8080/api/home') .subscribe( data => this.welcomeMessage = data, error => this.welcomeMessage = 'Welcome to Inazuma Eleven Victory Road Dex!' ); } }
